snippet.title: DOOMED Detective Game Trailer
snippet.description:
DOOMED Detective Game is a detective game with elements of action, logical puzzles, and riddles. The main character is called to solve a complex case—a mysterious murder in the city of Red Rock! But the most exciting feature of this game is its LIVING NPCs! You'll have the opportunity to speak with every NPC in the game using only your microphone and deductive reasoning. Use the information gathered during conversations, search for clues, and find the criminal!


Telegram Channel: https://t.me/aziktonstudio

STEAM PAGE: https://store.steampowered.com//app/3361180?beta=0
